              "[
                \"\",
                {\"text\":\"§lMeeting Record
Day 85

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§lMeeting led by: \"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDACTED

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§lTopic discussed: The Death of \"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDACTED\"}
              ]",
              "[
                {\"text\":\"After \"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDACTED \"},
                {\"text\":\"was pushed in the lava in a trip to the Nether dimension, \"},
                {\"text\":\"we think it was most likely that \"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDAC\"},
                {\"text\":\" was the one who pushed them. \"},
                {\"text\":\"They are being sent to the prison as we speak.\"}
              ]"
            ],
            title:Meeting,
            author:Unkown,
            display:{Lore:["Found in the ancient Stronghold"]}
            }
